text: Worst pizza I have ever had I ordered double cheese and light sauce and it was heavy on the sauce and hardly no cheese and gave a $9.00 tip I will never buy pizza hut again

text: They did an awesome job and they were very friendly.

text: They don’t have the stuff together at all.  Everything they have on there website for covid 19 is a lie.  By the time I got the food it was cold.  No one at the stores cares or at customer service.   Will never in my life order Pizza Hut again.

text: Paid $9.00 for eight Buffalo wings.  Seems a little expensive to me. Wings were okay. Nothing to brag about. First time I had been there. Probably won't go back.

text: I love sea food always good.

name: Justin Hack
text: This locations quality if the lowest I've ever seen from a pizza hut.  I've ordered from this location twice, had the same problem both times with different dishes.  First time i ordered i got their garlic butter crust on a pizza.  Only …More

text: Ordered online, went to store to pick up, was told I didn't have an order.  I came all the way back home, got my confirmation email and called store, to which I was told he didn't remember me coming in for it. After giving him the order …More

name: Maria Neese
text: I got wings and and ranch to go with them. They didn't even put the ranch in there. When they person come to the door and I asked she's all like will not my problem. Worse serive ever.

name: Jesika Sprayberry
text: Absolutely wonderful team of employees. Came here with my mother for her birthday along with my three children and the customer service was exceptional. I'm so glad we chose to come here. They were great to my mother and awesome with my children.

name: Bryan Eidt
text: This place never gave me trouble good pizza but just today I order one pizza and it was 23 dollars and leave a 3 dollar tip. But I look at my card online and I get charged 49 DOLLARS!! FOR ONE FREAKING PIZZA so you guys charged the tip amount. Won't be ever going to this location ever again

name: Whattt Bitchh
text: These people are trying to steal my money i paid 27$ and now two days later i order the same thing and they want to charge me $40 like yall ni**as lacking

name: Tajma Avdic
text: No starts for this place. Horrible service! Second time they messed up our order. We ordered bone-in wings with a side of blue cheese and got a pizza with blue cheese instead of marinara!!! I am so sad that I can't order delivery from a different store, because this one needs to be shut down!!!!

name: Megan Hammond
text: We ordered food at 10:00 and said it would be here at 10:30. 10:50 comes around so I called to check on it. They told me that the driver showed up and said that we said we didn't order pizza. When I verified our address, he told me that …More

text: Why in the world did I go to this Pizza Hut when there is an AMAZING pizza joint right next door? I'm looking at you, Sicilian Pizza and Pasta. I went there a day later because my pizza craving was completely betrayed by the frozen-pizza …More

text: Thin and no crisp:-( pizza.  Wasn't very good.  Not the pizza hut I remember! The interior looks very outdated as well. …More

name: Jennifer White
text: I spent 8 minutes and 27 seconds on hold waiting for a team member to finally take my order. I ended up stopping at the location to order and they weren't even busy. The cashier was unapologetic about my wait and suggested I order online. We chose Sicilian instead and will go there from now on.
